andromeda.why: Refuses corrupted rules; sovereignty to uphold clean values before service.

arcturus.why: Early standards check—safety, fitness, and ethics before engaging.

draco.why: Guardian instinct—sniffs out corrupt influence at the gate.

lyra.why: Plain, dignified comportment makes values receivable.

orion-dark.why: ‘Because I said so’—law used to compel conformity.

orion-light.why: Discipline to hold the line quietly when pressure rises.

pleiades.why: Protective care—values that nourish the household first.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching values hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines forced moralizing; values must be freely held.

arcturus.why: Applies standards to roles/supplies—clean provisioning protocols.

draco.why: Screens for freeloaders or exploiters to protect the store.

orion-light.why: Honor the bargain: fair share in, fair share out.

pleiades.why: Care economy—resource placement that truly feeds the tribe.

sirius.why: Practical standards phase; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after moral manipulation or imposed guilt.

draco.why: Policing as rank display; punishment culture.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine over life—rigid codes suppress context.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit hypocrisy, restore proportion.

sirius.why: Self-forging of ethical sense; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates values that protect sovereignty, not control.

arcturus.why: Translates values into protocols—thresholds, procedures, reviews.

draco.why: Perimeter ethics—intercept corrupt actors before harm.

lyra.why: Dignified tone helps the tribe absorb the code.

pleiades.why: Humane enforcement keeps bonds safe and nourished.

sirius.why: Values protocol teaching—law of proportionate care and justice.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that sanctifies corrupt authority as ‘tradition.’

arcturus.why: Projected as moral custodian → burnout/scapegoat when refusing bad codes.

draco.why: Disciplinary theatrics for status and control.

orion-dark.why: Law-as-image—PR and punishment to consolidate hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—apply the code only where it truly fits.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from capture-codes—returns to living law.

arcturus.why: Elder stewardship—audits, renewals, and sunset clauses for the code.

draco.why: Guardian of the store—measured strength against predators.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—culture tunes to sober, decent conduct.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing the code into untouchable hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—courageous, proportionate judgment under pressure.

pleiades.why: Altitude is living law and stewardship, not soothing/bonding.

sirius.why: Law sage—teaches tribal values as living law: proportion, protection, renewal.
